casebody.data:
Buck, Appellee, v. Village of Reminderville, Appellant, et al.

[Cite as Buck v. Reminderville, 132 Ohio St.3d 24, 2012-Ohio-1580.]

(No. 2011-0258 Submitted March 21, 2012 Decided April 12, 2012.) Kenneth D. Myers, for appellee. Tomino & Latchney, L.L.C., L.P.A., and John D. Latchney, for appellant.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of Sampson v. Cuyahoga Metro. Hous. Auth., 131 Ohio St.3d 418, 2012-Ohio-570, 966 N.E.2d 247.

O’Connor, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Donnell, Lanzinger, Cupp, and McGee Brown, JJ., concur.
